title: Stop having required Recert dates after end of MJ League Season
custom_preconds: GIVEN the major league season has ended
custom_steps: WHEN user views the Recertification widget
custom_expected: THEN no future recert dates should be present

title: Do not require a Recert due on or after a Transfer of DL
custom_preconds: GIVEN a player has a Recertification due
custom_steps: WHEN player is Transferred to a different DL
custom_expected:
THEN the current Recert due date is removed 
AND a new one is set for the new DL placement

title: Stop having required Recert dates upon Release
custom_preconds: GIVEN a player has a Recert due
custom_expected: THEN Recerts are no longer due

title: Player's future Recerts should be reflected for their new Org if Trade is made
custom_preconds: GIVEN a player has a recert due
custom_steps: WHEN player is traded to a new Org
custom_expected:
THEN Recert date should be removed from current Org
AND reflected in new Org

title: Receive Notification for player that is up for Recert or Reinstatement
custom_preconds: GIVEN player has a DL placement
custom_steps: WHEN player is up for Recert or Reinstatement

title: Receive warning if a Reinstate will put the Club over their active/reserve limit
custom_preconds: GIVEN a clubs active/reserve limits are met
custom_steps: WHEN a player from that club is reinstated (both mj and mn)
custom_expected: THEN user receives warning that the Club will exceed their Active/Reserve limits

title: BOC user receives Notification for missing SFD
custom_preconds: GIVEN player has a Place on 15 day or 60 day DL tx with a missing SFD
custom_steps:
WHEN 4 days have passed from the Roster Affected Date
AND nightly notification batch is run
custom_expected: THEN BOC user receives a notification

title: Reversing a Place on DL tx should place player's Waivers back in Effect
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a player was placed on the DL
AND had his waivers cancelled by it
custom_steps: WHEN user reverses the DL placement Tx
custom_expected: THEN the waivers should go back in effect
